text: The flag of Santiago Matatl치n () consists of a brown pointed field with the map of Oaxaca state that symbolizes its integration into the state of Oaxaca. In the center is the municipal shield between two purple stripes and a smaller central strip of agave green. At the top there is a legend that says Santiago Matatl치n with the coat of arms of city. It was adopted in 2010. ==References== Santiago Matatl치n Category:Flags with coats of arms
